#summary Guide to using gource with Mercurial

== mercurial_gourcelog.py ==

[http://code.google.com/u/mwu368/ mwu368] has contributed a python script  [http://gource.googlecode.com/files/mercurial-gource-1.0.tar.gz mercurial-gource.py] that can be used to show a Mercurial repository in gource using the 'custom' log format option.

Usage:

{{{
 mercurial_gourcelog.py [OUTPUT_FILE]
}}}

Where `OUTPUT_FILE` is the output file for the custom log. If `OUTPUT_FILE` is not provided, output will go to stdout.

Example usage with gource (assuming that gource is installed):

{{{
mercurial-gource.py project.log && gource project.log
}}}

Or piping directly into gource:

{{{
mercurial-gource.py | gource --log-format custom -
}}}
